subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Fourth-tier Bradford pulled off another major surprise in the League Cup, beating Aston Villa, 3-1, in the first leg of their semifinal to move one step away from the club’s first major final since 1911.
snippet: Fourth-tier Bradford pulled off another major surprise in the League Cup, beating Aston Villa, 3-1, in the first leg of their semifinal to move one step away from the club’s first major final since 1911.
